type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"NewsArticle","mainEntityOfPage":"https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/amid-dating-rumours-aditya-roy-kapur-spills-beans-on-his-wedding-plans-i-will-take-my-time-bollywood-news-article-98955563","url":"https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/amid-dating-rumours-aditya-roy-kapur-spills-beans-on-his-wedding-plans-i-will-take-my-time-bollywood-news-article-98955563","articleBody":"Renowned Bollywood actors Ananya Panday and Aditya Roy Kapur have been making headlines about their relationship rumours ever since their 'mushy' glimpse went viral. They might be tight-lipped about it, but their regular outings earlier together narrate a different tale.After stealing everyone's hearts with Night Manager, Aditya is currently gearing up for Gumraah and recently opened up about his wedding plans and revealed that he is not getting any FOMO looking at other couples getting married.Aditya Roy on his wedding plansDuring the trailer launch of Gumrah, Aditya was asked about his wedding plans and he said, \"I think every one is getting married but I am not getting any FOMO. So, I will take my time and do it when the time is right.” In addition, to walking the ramp together, Aditya and Ananya were seen hanging out together at numerous events. The duo made heads turn when they arrived at a Diwali bash in matching outfits.For those who don't know, a small dating rumour was sparked between the duo when Ananya came to Karan’s famous chat show, Koffee With Karan. Then, a few months ago, one pic of Ananya talking with Aditya at Ramesh's Diwali party went viral on social media and their dating rumour became one of the hottest topics of discussion in Tinsel Town.Then, during the Diwali party, a video of them posing together for the paps took over the internet by storm. In the clip, Aditya was seen flashing his million-dollar smile while posing for the camera, and within a few moments, Ananya was seen coming towards him, and the paparazzi asked them to pose together. As soon as they posed for the camera, one of the paps commented, \"Ye jodi hit hai.\"Well, there is no official confirmation of the news yet. Only time can say what’s cooking between the two!","datePublished":"2023-03-24T10:14:48+05:30","dateModified":"2023-03-24T10:14:48+05:30","articleSection":"Entertainment News","headline":"Amid dating rumours, Aditya Roy Kapur SPILLS beans on his wedding plans: I will take my time","keywords":"aditya roy kapur,Ananya Panday,Aditya Ananya,Night Manager,entertainment news,","description":"Recently, at the trailer launch of Gumraah, Aditya Roy Kapur opened up about his wedding plans amid dating rumours with Ananya Panday. In the clip, Aditya was seen flashing his million-dollar smile while posing for the camera, and within a few moments, Ananya was seen coming towards him, and the paparazzi asked them to pose together. Congress MP Rahul Gandhi was barred from serving in the Lok Sabha on Friday, one day after a Surat court found him guilty of criminal defamation. The Lok Sabha Secretariat declared his disqualification, stating that it took effect as of March 23, the day of his conviction. Rahul Gandhi would be unable to run for office for eight years following his disqualification unless a higher court overturned his conviction and sentence. He was 68. The director's death has stunned the entire Bollywood industry. Notably, his final rites have begun at Mumbai's Santacruz Hindu Crematorium, where several celebrities, including Rani Mukerji, Vidya Balan, Vidhu Vinod Chopra, and others, have arrived to pay their respects.Pradeep Sarkar's funeral beginsPradeep Sarkar's mortal remains were carried in an ambulance, which was decked up with flowers. His relatives were seen sitting inside the ambulance to bid adieu to the late famous filmmaker.         Rani Mukerji, Vidya Balan and other celebs arrive to pay Pradeep Sarkar their last respects  Rani Mukerji was spotted at the crematorium to pay last respects to Pradeep Sarkar. She has worked with him in the film, Laga Chunari Mein Daag.     Vidya Balan and her husband Siddharth Roy Kapur arrived to see Pradeep Sarkar for the last time. For the unversed, Vidya made her Bollywood debut with Pradeep's film, Parineeta.     Producer and director, Vidhu Vinod Chopra was also seen at the crematorium to bid adieu to Pradeep Sarkar. His wife Anupama Chopra was also there at the funeral. Apart from them, Ashok Pandit, Dia Mirza, Neil Nitin Mukesh, Divyanka Tripathi, Vivek Dahiya, Rhea Chakraborty and others were also present at the funeral of Pradeep Sarkar.         Deepika Padukone and Neil Nitin Mukesh attended their Lafangey Parindey director, Pradeep Sarkar's last rites today in Mumbai.     Talking about Pradeep Sarkar's death, his family shared a statement with the media. They said, \"It is with a heavy heart that we inform you that Pradeep has departed from his heavenly abode. Please join us at 4 pm for his funeral at Santacruz Hindu Crematorium to say goodbye to him.\" If reports are to be believed, he was on dialysis and his potassium levels had dropped drastically.","cmstype":"ARTICLE","status":"ACTIVE","title":"Pradeep Sarkar last rites begin. While not much information has been revealed about the movie so far, the actor was recently spotted shooting in a hospital for the crime drama, which has left many fans excited. Ranbir Kapoor’s hospital look from Animal In a now viral video uploaded by the actor's fan page, Ranbir can be seen shooting for the highly awaited film in a hospital. Donning a blue hospital gown, the Bollywood actor sported a huge beard and unkempt long hair. Seemingly on a break, Ranbir can be seen walking towards the lift while taking his mobile from the unit boy standing beside him. Take a look at the clip right here: While many fans commented on Ranbir's huge stature, some felt he reminded them of Shahid Kapoor's Kabir Singh. For the unversed, Kabir Singh was also directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga and starred Shahid Kapoor and Kiara Advani in lead roles.       About AnimalWritten and directed by Kabir Singh fame Sandeep Reddy Vanga, Animal stars Ranbir Kapoor along with Anil Kapoor, Rashmika Mandana, Bobby Deol and Tripti Dimri in pivotal roles. The psychological crime drama is scheduled to hit the big screens on August 11 this year.Earlier last year, Sandeep Reddy Vanga had shared some details about Ranbir's character in Animal. \"I don’t think Ranbir’s character is close to Kabir Singh. You won’t find any similarity in the characters but there’s definitely violence. What will be common between both the movies is that they’re character-driven stories,\" he said in an interview with RRR director SS Rajamouli.         Even lead actor Ranbir had thrown some light on his character in the film. Sharing that his role will be that of a ruthless gangster while Anil Kapoor will play his domineering father, the B-town actor told Pinkvilla, “It's quite a shocking character and has got a lot of gray shades to it.\"","cmstype":"ARTICLE","status":"ACTIVE","title":"Animal on the loose! He was responding to Rahul's exclusion from the Lok Sabha. Rahul Gandhi was removed from Parliament on Friday after being found guilty of defamation in a case involving his remark on the \"Modi surname\" by a Surat court. Congress MP Rahul Gandhi was barred from serving in the Lok Sabha on Friday, one day after a Surat court found him guilty of criminal defamation. The Lok Sabha Secretariat declared his disqualification, stating that it took effect as of March 23, the day of his conviction. Rahul Gandhi would be unable to run for office for eight years following his disqualification unless a higher court overturned his conviction and sentence. There will soon be a floating jetty built for city tourists and devotees.\"For more details on this news keep watching Times Now for the latest updates.#timesnow #breakingnews #latestnews #englishnews #varanasi #englishnews"}}]},"leadVideoAutoPlay":true},{"msid":98969651,"parentid":87845845,"hostid":183,"text":"Ever since Parineeti Chopra was spotted with Aam Aadmi Party aka AAP leader Raghav Chadha on a dinner date in Mumbai, netizens started speculating if they are dating each other or not. Notably, after having dinner together the previous night, the duo was again spotted together the next morning for a lunch. Well, their back-to-back appearances spark dating rumours among the masses. However, the latest report suggests that they are not dating. Raghav Chadha and Parineeti Chopra are not in a relationship According to a leading portal, Parineeti Chopra and Raghav Chadha are just good friends and are not dating each other. The IndiaToday.in report also suggests that Raghav and Parineeti studied together at the same college, i.e., the London School of Economics. Interestingly, they share several common friends and interests, such as travelling. A source further stated that they often discuss less-explored international travel destinations. Moreover, AAP leader Raghav Chadha also follows only 44 people on Twitter and only two of them are from Bollywood - Gul Panag (AAP member) and Parineeti Chopra. It has to be noted that Parineeti and Raghav have not yet opened up about their alleged relationship. Hence, there is no official confirmation about the same. Both the lead heroes will fight Varinder Singh Ghuman and his gang in this biggest action sequence set in the jail for Tiger 3,\" the source revealed. | top news","synopsis":"Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge claimed that Rahul Gandhi had suffered for speaking the truth. He was responding to Rahul's exclusion from the Lok Sabha. Rahul Gandhi was removed from Parliament on Friday after being found guilty of defamation in a case involving his remark on the \"Modi surname\" by a Surat court. Congress MP Rahul Gandhi was barred from serving in the Lok Sabha on Friday, one day after a Surat court found him guilty of criminal defamation. The Lok Sabha Secretariat declared his disqualification, stating that it took effect as of March 23, the day of his conviction. Rahul Gandhi would be unable to run for office for eight years following his disqualification unless a higher court overturned his conviction and sentence. Lataa Saberwal diagnosed with early nodules on her voice box Lataa Saberwal’s Instagram post left fans and celebrities heartbroken by sharing news about her serious throat issue. The post has gone viral on social media, where several netizens have expressed concern over her health. Lataa shared a note on Instagram, in which she wrote, \"Just visited the ENT for my throat. I have developed early nodules on my voice box hence I have been suggested complete voice rest for at least a week. I have been put on steroids as that is the only way it can heal. It is a serious issue if I don't take care, it can lead to permanent voice alteration or loss of voice is also feared.\" She also asked her fans to keep her in their prayers. Celebs react to Lataa Saberwal’s post Lataa Saberwal’s post grabbed everyone’s attention. Her husband Sanjeev Seth’s first wife and actress Resham Tipnis commented on her post. The series is led by a stellar ensemble cast featuring Prosenjit Chatterjee, Aditi Rao Hydari, Aparshakti Khurana, Wamiqa Gabbi, Sidhant Gupta, Nandish Sandhu, and Ram Kapoor in pivotal roles.Jubilee trailer out Prime Video dropped the trailer earlier today, alongside the caption, “The world of Jubilee encapsulates everything from the soaring dreams, to the desires to the aspirations set against the backdrop of the golden age of Indian cinema ✨ #JubileeOnPrime New Series , Apr 7 trailer out now!\"  The series has been broken into two parts, with Part One (Episodes One - Five) dropping on April 7, while Part Two (Episodes Six-10) releasing the following week on April 14.  About Jubilee With screenplay and dialogues by Atul Sabharwal and produced by Andolan Films in association with Reliance Entertainment and Phantom Studios , the series features a phenomenal ensemble cast led by Prosenjit Chatterjee, Aditi Rao Hydari, Aparshakti Khurana, Wamiqa Gabbi, Sidhant Gupta, Nandish Sandhu, and Ram Kapoor.   Jubilee unveils the stories and dreams that gave birth to the Hindi film industry as we know it. Set against the backdrop of the golden age of Indian cinema, Jubilee is a thrilling yet poetic tale woven around an ensemble of characters and the gambles they’re willing to take, in pursuit of their dreams, passion, ambition and love. Speaking about Jubilee, Vikramaditya Motwane said, \" “Jubilee has been a love story in the making for me ever since I was an assistant director enamored with the world of the movies, even when there wasn’t a story to tell.\" He went on to add, \"While the series is set in that celebrated era of cinema, at its core, Jubilee is a very human story, with narrative themes that will resonate with everyone – which is what drew me to the story in the first place. We’ve painstakingly researched each aspect of the series to remain true to its era. It’s been the most incredible journey made with the support of a terrific studio, with some of the most amazing actors, and with the best possible crew ever. Every day on this series has been a delight and I cannot wait for the world to see the work that we’ve all done.” ","cmstype":"ARTICLE","status":"ACTIVE","title":"Jubilee trailer out: Vikramaditya Motwane traces history of Hindi film industry in Prosenjit, Aparshakti starrer","cmssource":"CMSLITE","parenttitle":"Entertainment News","titleforurl":"jubilee trailer out: vikramaditya motwane traces history of hindi film industry in prosenjit chatterjee, aparshakti khurana starrer","synopsis":"The much-awaited trailer of Vikramaditya Motwane and Soumik Sen's Jubilee has finally dropped. Congress MP Rahul Gandhi was barred from serving in the Lok Sabha on Friday, one day after a Surat court found him guilty of criminal defamation. The Lok Sabha Secretariat declared his disqualification, stating that it took effect as of March 23, the day of his conviction. Rahul Gandhi would be unable to run for office for eight years following his disqualification unless a higher court overturned his conviction and sentence. main.articleBody: Renowned Bollywood actors Ananya Panday and Aditya Roy Kapur have been making headlines about their relationship rumours ever since their 'mushy' glimpse went viral. They might be tight-lipped about it, but their regular outings earlier together narrate a different tale.After stealing everyone's hearts with Night Manager, Aditya is currently gearing up for Gumraah and recently opened up about his wedding plans and revealed that he is not getting any FOMO looking at other couples getting married.Aditya Roy on his wedding plansDuring the trailer launch of Gumrah, Aditya was asked about his wedding plans and he said, "I think every one is getting married but I am not getting any FOMO. So, I will take my time and do it when the time is right.” In addition, to walking the ramp together, Aditya and Ananya were seen hanging out together at numerous events. The duo made heads turn when they arrived at a Diwali bash in matching outfits.For those who don't know, a small dating rumour was sparked between the duo when Ananya came to Karan’s famous chat show, Koffee With Karan. Then, a few months ago, one pic of Ananya talking with Aditya at Ramesh's Diwali party went viral on social media and their dating rumour became one of the hottest topics of discussion in Tinsel Town.Then, during the Diwali party, a video of them posing together for the paps took over the internet by storm. In the clip, Aditya was seen flashing his million-dollar smile while posing for the camera, and within a few moments, Ananya was seen coming towards him, and the paparazzi asked them to pose together. As soon as they posed for the camera, one of the paps commented, "Ye jodi hit hai."Well, there is no official confirmation of the news yet. Only time can say what’s cooking between the two!
main.headline: Amid dating rumours, Aditya Roy Kapur SPILLS beans on his wedding plans: I will take my time
main.keywords: aditya roy kapur,Ananya Panday,Aditya Ananya,Night Manager,entertainment news,
